breakpoint if firing a change notification, and is then deleted. Since the 
viewer updates asynchronoushly, the change upate fails (the breakpoint is

hard to see how you would actually acheive this (at user speed).

Fixed. Since I can see how the problem potentially happens, I have added code

noticiation pending soon after).
